definitions.text: far away from home or one's usual surroundings; - R.A.Hall
examples: looking afield for new lands to conquer

definitions.text: in or into a field (especially a field of battle)
examples: the armies were afield, challenging the enemy's advance
unlawful to carry hunting rifles afield until the season opens

definitions.text: off the subject; beyond the point at issue
examples: such digressions can lead us too far afield
